column5: With the cost of owning a cottage, the time commitment with maintenance and also it pretty much locks you into one location, my wife and I have been renting a cottage for a week every year for the past 10 years. We have had the pleasure of renting in the Bancroft area, Big Rideau lake on an island, PEI(saweeeet) and this year, the Thousand Islands just west of Gananoque. WOW, what a beautiful area. I have been fishing the Larry for about 10-12 years now, but most of the time was spent looking at a GPS/Sonar rather than the scenery. This year was different. We spent 7 days relaxing, swimming, skiing, tubing, relaxing, fishing, playing games, having fires and did I say relaxing...lol.  here is a few pics of the area
A few fish   A decent little spotty from the Larry  A few lakers from the Big Rideau today, threw 2 more back and lost a fattie at boatside.
The house in the third pic is really out there in the elements eh!!!  Hope it never floods there  Nice fish and glad you got to relax!!
Very nice...  And nice clean musky you got...
That looks like a sweet place to take a vacation for sure !!!!! Some nice fish too !!!!!
